name: Emirates Aviation Services LLC
about: Emirates Aviation Services LLC, established as Emirates Flying School in 1989 under the patronage of His Highness Sheikh Ahmed Bin Saeed Al Maktoum, is a pioneer in general aviation and flight training in the UAE. Certified by the UAE General Civil Aviation Authority (GCAA), it is the first flight school to achieve this distinction. Located in Dubai, the school offers students the unique experience of training in the Dubai Airspace alongside commercial jets. Over the years, Emirates Aviation Services has diversified into various aviation sectors, providing comprehensive training from Private Pilot Licences (PPL) to advanced certifications. The school's commitment to education and training reflects the country's emphasis on development and growth, making it an ideal place to launch a flying career. With a rich history and state-of-the-art facilities, Emirates Aviation Services LLC continues to be a leading institution in aviation training.
